price: នៅខាងមុខគេ គឺនរកជើហាន់ណាំ ហើយគេនឹងឱ្យអ្នក នោះផឹកនូវទឹកខ្ទុះឈាម។
arabic: مِّن وَرَآئِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ وَيُسۡقَىٰ مِن مَّآءٖ صَدِيدٖ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: min warāihi jahannamu wayus'qā min māin ṣadīdin
translations: and he will be made to drink
